citation.biblCit: Wiseman, D.; Pegg, J. M.; Hostetler, A., 2015, "Canadian Science Education Academic Genealogy (May 2014)", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/10478, UAL Dataverse, V1

stdyInfo.abstract: This image presents an academic genealogy of Canadian Science Education Researchers in Canada. Key for Individuals: - Current Canadian Science Education Researchers (Orange) - Supervisors that have been identified as Canadian Education Researchers in other disciplines (Blue) - Supervisors for which the discipline is unknown (Grey) *Colors of the lines indicate the geographic location of the supervisor.

citation.biblCit: Wiseman, D., & Pegg, J. (2014). Considering the field: Science education research and researchers in the Canadian context. Paper presented at the Canadian Society for the Study of Education, St. Catharines, ON.
